s.text: In Paris, Le Monde , welcoming the indictment as an important new step "in the fight against impunity and barbarism," said Arbour had acted with full independence and freedom, but this view was questioned south of the Alps.
The Times said the West "has to thank the brave Canadian judge" for ending any chance that NATO would grant Milosevic immunity from arrest and prosecution--one of his principal peace conditions.
